item.title: House Republicans introduce bill to erase USAID
item.description: Reps. Marjorie Taylor Greene and Chip Roy introduced legislation Friday that would abolish the beleaguered U.S. Agency for International Development.

item.title: Alaska lawmakers officially oppose Trump's push to change Denali to Mount McKinley
item.description: The Alaska Legislature wants President Trump to rethink his order renaming North America's tallest peak.

item.title: House Democrats demand end to 'illegal' work stoppage at CFPB
item.description: Dozens of House Democrats are alarmed by the Trump administration's next target in its cost-cutting quest: the Consumer Financial Protection Bureau.

item.title: The U.S. stopped allowing passport gender marker changes. Here are some of the people affected
